title: Short Program 3
original_name: ショート・プログラム 3 あだち充傑作短編作品集
sinopse:
1. Geta to Diamond (Geta and Diamonds)
2. Doko Fuku Kaze (Where the Wind Blows)
3. Tenshi no Hammer (Angel's Hammer)
   4-5. Memory Off
4. Shiroi Natsu (White Summer) [Story: Buronson]
5. Shikakui Umi (Square Sea)
   8-10. Idol A
6. Nigeta Kamisama (The Runaway God)
7. Short Mail
